thread.title: Six Nations 2017: Dan Biggar and George North injury doubts for Wales
thread.title_full: Six Nations 2017: Dan Biggar and George North injury doubts for Wales

title: Six Nations 2017: Dan Biggar and George North injury doubts for Wales
text:
George North scored his 28th try for Wales in the Six Nations win over Italy Six Nations: Wales v England Venue: Principality Stadium, Cardiff Date: Saturday, 11 February Kick-off: 16:50 GMT Coverage: Live on BBC One Wales, S4C, BBC Radio Wales, BBC Radio Cymru & BBC Sport website and BBC Sport app, plus live text commentary Wales backs George North and Dan Biggar will be given time to prove their fitness ahead of Saturday's Six Nations game against England. 
Fly-half Biggar and wing North suffered injuries during the 33-7 win over Italy. 
Biggar failed to return after half-time after he injured ribs while North played on, and scored a try, despite taking an early blow to the thigh. 
Luke Charteris is also a doubt but Taulupe Faletau will be available. 
More to follow.
